name: Dalk
summary: A war between the god Matis and a group of rival goddesses called Mira leaves Matis sealed away in a deserted temple. To break the seal a young monk and a group of female adventurers will have to get to the top of a mountain and seal away the goddesses of Mira in the process.
info:
